subject: Golf

Television
Adultery
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: As Tiger Woods dealt with the loss of a major sponsor Sunday, the PGA Tour and its players must face the prospect of another protracted absence by its biggest rainmaker.
snippet: As Tiger Woods dealt with the loss of a major sponsor Sunday, the PGA Tour and its players must face the prospect of another protracted absence by its biggest rainmaker.
